sn2.30:1.3: sahali → sahalī (bj, s1-3, km, pts1-2), nīko → niṅko (bj, pts1) | niko (s1-3, km, pts2), vegabbhari ca → veṭambarī ca (bj, s1-3, km, pts1-2)
sn2.30:4.4: Na hi nūna tādisaṃ karoti → naha nūna tādī pakaroti (bj, s1, s2, km, pts2) | nahi nūna tādī pakaroti (s3)
sn2.30:10.1: Sahācaritena → sahāravenāpi (si, pts2) | saha racitena (s1-3) | sagāravenāpi (pts1), sigālo → siṅgālo (mr)
sn2.30:17.2: nakkhattānaṃva candimā → nakkhattānañca candimā (bj, s1-3, km, pts1-2)
